company_context: IT Service Desk Software | SolarWinds Service Desk A cloud-based and AI-powered IT service management (ITSM) platform built to maximize productivity and accelerate resolution with lightning-fast time to value Starts at $39 Per month, per technician, supports unlimited users. Start Free Trial Fully functional for 30 days Request Demo Get a Quote The AI-powered service management solution you need SolarWinds Service Desk streamlines IT operations and elevates user experiences through better IT Service Management ensuring IT meets the needs of users and the business. Incident Management Faster resolution with an AI-powered incident management system designed for efficiency, scale, and better processes. View Less Intelligent incident management hyper focused on the efficiency your teams need. Assisted response: auto identify solutions, ticket sentiment monitoring, centralized procedures, and automatic assignment Live collaboration: Real time comments and status updates Multi-channel: Engage via web, email, Teams, Slack, or mobile app Learn More IT Asset Management Drive visibility, optimization, and compliance through smarter asset management. View More Robust Asset Management delivering critical visibility Discover & Report: Scan your network and report on connected devices Full coverage tracking: On-premises, physical, virtual, cloud, hardware, software, buildings, and more Licenses: Ensure optimal usage of assets and license Learn More Configuration management database (CMDB) Understand the relationship between infrastructure and your business-critical applications and systems. View More A CMDB critical to the uptime of your business Dependency Mapping: Understand relationships between configuration items (CIs). Asset-Incident Correlation : Connect assets to incidents for root cause analysis and asset-issue history Impact analysis: Understand change impact based on asset dependencies. Learn More Change Management Structured change processes to minimize risk and maximize stability View More Plan, execute, and communicate changes seamlessly Structure: Centralized documentation, approvals, and process for proper changes Audits: Maintain a history of all changes in the event a rollback or audit is needed Impact: Asset connections drives deep understanding of change request dependencies Learn More Artificial Intelligence Assisting agents and users with scalable service delivery and issue resolution View More An AI-powered service desk makes life easier SolarWinds AI: Generative AI sidekick that builds solutions, responses, and summaries for your agents Virtual Agent: A chat bot helps users get to answers faster Smart Suggestions: Solutions displayed while searching or submitting tickets Sentiment Analysis: Prioritize tickets based on urgency Auto Categorization: Recommendations based on ticket content Learn More Enterprise Service Management Improve the management, efficiency, interactions and experience across every department View More Taking service

conversation.speaker: Seller
conversation.message: Hi, my name is Alex and I'm calling from DeepData AI. We're a data processing solution that helps companies like yours streamline their IT operations and elevate user experiences. I came across your company and saw that you're currently using SolarWinds Service Desk. I'd love to discuss how our solution can complement and enhance your existing IT service management.

conversation.speaker: Buyer
conversation.message: Ah, yeah. We've just implemented SolarWinds and it's been working fine for us so far. What makes you think we need another solution on top of that?

conversation.speaker: Seller
conversation.message: Well, while SolarWinds is a great tool for IT service management, our solution focuses specifically on data processing and can help you gain deeper insights into your operations. We've seen companies reduce their incident resolution time by up to 30% with our solution. Would you like to hear more about how it works?

conversation.speaker: Buyer
conversation.message: I'm not sure we're looking to add another tool to our stack right now. We've just finished implementing SolarWinds and we're still getting used to it. Timing-wise, it's not great for us to be considering another new solution. Plus, I'm not sure our budget can accommodate another $39 per month per technician, especially if we're not sure about the ROI.

conversation.speaker: Seller
conversation.message: I completely understand your concerns about timing and budget. However, our solution is designed to be highly scalable and can integrate seamlessly with SolarWinds. We've had other customers who have seen significant returns on their investment, often within the first 6-12 months. We also offer a free trial, so you can test it out and see the benefits for yourself before committing to a purchase.

conversation.speaker: Buyer
conversation.message: I appreciate the offer, but I'm still not convinced. We've also been looking at other solutions, like ServiceNow, and I'm not sure how DeepData AI compares to them. To be honest, I'd need to discuss this with my team and get their input before we can even consider moving forward.

conversation.speaker: Seller
conversation.message: I understand that you want to do your due diligence and compare options. If you're interested, I can provide some case studies and comparisons with other solutions like ServiceNow. I'd also be happy to set up a demo to show you how our solution can work with your existing tools.

conversation.speaker: Buyer
conversation.message: I think we're going to have to pass on this for now. We've got a lot on our plate and I don't see this as a priority for us at the moment. I appreciate the call, but I don't think we'll be moving forward with DeepData AI.

analysis.raw:
Score: 4
Outcome: Failure
Key_Objection: Timing
Feedback: The seller could have more effectively addressed the buyer's timing concerns by offering a more flexible trial or implementation schedule to better align with the buyer's current priorities. Sentiment: Neutral
